title: WhiteNodes
header: The fastest and easiest way to run your own Ethereum node.

about.title: Your access to the Ethereum network
about.subtitle: WhiteNodes infrastructure will ensure your decentralized application scales to meet your user demand.

target1.title: Built for developers
target1.subtitle: Connect your app immediately with our instant access APIs. We support JSON-RPC over HTTPS and WebSocket interfaces, providing request and subscription-based connections.

target2.title: Built for startups
target2.subtitle: Use a robust solution for your fast-growing project.
